basic.description:
Designed for students at the intermediate-advanced level.  The course aims at developing communicative competence in the fields of business, commerce, industry, and German in the workplace, with specific emphasis on approaches to intercultural communication. The course prepares students for the internationally recognized exam Zertifikat Deutsch für den Beruf.  Students can write the exam on campus.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: GRMN
basic.title: Business German II:  German in the Workplace

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of C in GRMN 202, or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
